name: The Cat of Hagia Sophia
description:
Since the Roman Empire, Hagia Sophia is one of the most magnificent buildings in the whole of Istanbul and other than us, humans, there are other creatures like that adore this building. Since the Ottoman’s, the cats are very much welcomed in the Hagia Sophia, living with people side by side yet there is one special that we lost in late 2020, Gli. In this game, you will experience one day of Gli and how people interacted with him and admire how beautiful it is to have our small friends with us.

Creators:

Mustafa Batuhan Ceylan

Berkay Yıldız

Berkay Ülke
